WRITING.TEXT:

To a much lesser extent, the similar unknowing-ness and mystery of *Rendezvous with Rama* has always been disconcerting, as has the overbearing cruelty and hopelessness in *I Have No Mouth and I Must Scream*.
So, again, what is some of your favourite Sci-Fi horror, whether or not it was intended to be?
